metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Normal. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Josh Hardt, AAMS®

heroDescription: Normal, Illinois is a vibrant community known for its educational institutions and growing economy.
landscapeDescription: With a population of 54,664, Normal serves as a key economic hub in Central Illinois. The city benefits from a diverse economy driven by education, healthcare, and retail.
uniqueNeeds: Normal requires tailored financial strategies focusing on education and healthcare sectors.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Normal's economy relies on education and healthcare, posing risks if these sectors falter. Real estate prices are rising; monitor for bubble risks. Prepare for tornadoes and flooding.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Normal's economy has seen a steady growth rate of 3.2% annually, driven by local universities and healthcare expansion.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Normal is approximately $60,000, reflecting a stable middle-class demographic.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Normal are increasingly focusing on education and healthcare sectors, aligning with local economic strengths.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Normal's cost of living is 10% lower than the national average, making it an attractive place for families.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the real estate market in Normal is experiencing a 5% annual increase in home values, indicating rising demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Normal's business climate is favorable, supported by local government initiatives and a skilled workforce.
